title: GSRS Version 2.3.1 Released
text: The newest version of the GSRS software, version 2.3.1 is now available to the public. The new version adds several new features, bug-fixes, and general quality of life improvements. The full change log as well as download links for this and older versions can be found on the release page

title: The ginas Project Public Website Relaunches
text: The ginas project has updated the look and layout of its public site. The update is intended to help visitors more easily access resources such as information and updates about the ginas project and the G-SRS software, as well as downloads and demos of G-SRS. Please contact ginas if anyone has questions or feedback about the new layout.
